__e: I guess nobody had any way of knowing I'd make such a complete fool of myself.
Anyway, you dummy, I love you... and I want to live with you.
Don't be silly, it's not my fault
Don't be foolish, don't leave now because you're in no condition to face it
You finally succeeded in making a fool out of me, didn't you?
No, you'll get through with your speech tomorrow and your silly expedition and I'll do everything I have to do.
Don't be a silly girl, Miss D. Of course I won't take it back.
And you're such a cruel mother and I hate you so much.
